segmentosSRT.text:
I had been in the army for three years,
until I got kicked out...
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: They wanted me to sell them.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: MUTE FIRE
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
On February 10th 1906, four men
tried to murder the president of Colombia.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
The staging of that event, was the
beginning of cinema in the country.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: - Ok. What's your name? - Gustavo Rojas.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: No, no. I think it's better alone.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Let's stop for a minute. One question. She will ask so you can answer that...
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Since in June 1964 we had already...
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Banana field blueprint
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ I remember when I saw
you for the first time
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ I can't deny it, I was
scared to confess to you
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ You looked at me, and I stared at you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ Until one day, we finally
understood each other.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ Who could imagine that then
our children would come
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
♪ To bring joy to this
place for all eternity.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: We took her to the doctor
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: To everyone I thought could know.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: I think that she is taking somehow revenge.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
If that’s the case, she
should have said it,
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: and it would have been better
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
that we would just
have ended everything.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
and families dissolve, families
should not self-destruct.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: I think we never talked enough about love.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
Because if we had talked
enough about love
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
we would have understood
it from the beginning.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
Love is born, it grows and it
dies like everything in nature.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
I believe that the academic attitude is not
only repeating texts in the universities
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
- Was my exit okay?
- It was fine.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Cut.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Roll camera, roll sound.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: - Do I have to clap again? - Yes, please.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: …or something like that.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ With justice and truth next to the people it is
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ the little song that was born in our guerrilla voice
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ of struggle and future.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ With Bolivar, Galán already rode again.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ No more weeping and pain of the homeland.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ We are people who go after freedom
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ building the path of peace.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ Guerilla of the FARC with the people to triumph
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ for the fatherland, the people and the bread.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ Guerilla of the FARC, with the voice of unity
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ to achieve freedom.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ Guerrilla of the FARC with the people to triumph
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ for the fatherland, the people and the bread.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ Guerilla of the FARC, with the voice of unity
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: ♪ to achieve freedom.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: I've only lost twice in ten years.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text:
Because I stopped competing. I've been
the winner for eight years now.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: - You stopped competing? - Yes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: - We wish you good luck for tomorrow. - Thank you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Federico.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Federico...
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Federico...
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: Federico.
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined

segmentosSRT.text: MUTE FIRE
segmentosSRT.speaker: undefined
